creator: griffin
prompt:
Create a mobile-friendly and SEO-optimized directory page called **\"One Prompt Sites\"**.

Fetch site data from this JSON URL:  
**https://yourdomain.com/sites.json**

Each entry in the JSON includes:
- `url`: The website URL
- `date`: ISO date string (e.g. \"2025-05-12\")
- `creator`: Name or code name of the site creator
- `prompt`: The full AI prompt used to create the site (this may include line breaks, indentation, and markdown-style formatting)

### Display Requirements:
- Clickable website link (open in new tab)
- Human-readable date (e.g. \"May 12, 2025\")
- Creator name or alias
- Chevron or toggle to expand and show the full prompt

### Formatting Notes:
- Preserve line breaks and formatting from the `prompt` field
- Render prompt text inside a `<pre>` or styled `<div>` to maintain spacing and indentation
- Ensure markdown (if present) is rendered cleanly or at least legible
- Use semantic HTML and accessible labels

### Design Guidelines:
- Sort entries by newest first
- Hero title: “One Prompt Sites”
- Subheading: “Websites created with a single AI prompt.”
- Intro paragraph:  
  > “Explore the creativity and power of one-prompt web creation. This directory highlights real sites built from a single Lovable AI prompt—fast, minimal, and AI-driven.”
- Minimal, clean UI with mobile responsiveness
- Add a footer with a placeholder for social/contact links

### SEO Optimized Keywords:
- “AI-built websites”
- “AI website prompts”
- “One prompt web builds”
- “Websites built with AI”
- “Prompt-powered web creation”
